original_text: Ahaz took valuable things from the Lord's temple, from the king's palace and from his officers. He gave those things to the king of Assyria. But the king of Assyria still did not help him.
korean_text: 아하스가 여호와의 전과 왕궁과 방백들의 집에서 재물을 가져다가 앗수르 왕에게 주었으나 그에게 유익이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Ahaz took valuable things from the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 아하스는 주의 성전에서 귀한 물건들을 가져갔고

sentences.original_text: He gave those things to the king of Assyria
But the king of Assyria still did not help him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 앗수르 왕은 여전히 그를 돕지 않았다
